    • Constructor Detail

      • YamlLintConfig

        public YamlLintConfig(String content)
               throws IOException,
                      YamlLintConfigException
        Constructs a YamlLintConfig from a YAML string
        Parameters:
        content - the configuration as a YAML string
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs handling the passed file
        YamlLintConfigException - if the configuration contains an error so that its content cannot be successfully parsed
        IllegalArgumentException - if content is null

      • YamlLintConfig

        public YamlLintConfig(URL file)
               throws IOException,
                      YamlLintConfigException
        Constructs a YamlLintConfig from a YAML file
        Parameters:
        file - a YAML configuration file identified by a URL
        Throws:
        IOException - if an error occurs handling the passed file
        YamlLintConfigException - if the configuration contains an error so that its content cannot be successfully parsed
        IllegalArgumentException - if file is null

    • Method Detail

      • isFileIgnored

        public boolean isFileIgnored(String filepath)
        Tells if a file identified by its path is to be ignored by this tool
        Parameters:
        filepath - the path of the file to be checked by this tool
        Returns:
        true if the file must be ignored, false otherwise

      • getEnabledRules

        public List<Rule> getEnabledRules(File file)
        Returns the rules to be checked for the passed file
        Parameters:
        file - the file to be checked
        Returns:
        the list of rules to be checked for the file. All rules are returned if file is null.

      • getRuleConf

        public Object getRuleConf(String id)
        Returns the configuration for the rule identified by its ID
        Parameters:
        id - a rule ID
        Returns:
        a configuration map or null if not found

      • extend

        public void extend(YamlLintConfig baseConfig)
        Updates the ruleConf attribute of this configuration instance with the one of the passed configuration. Existing entries are replaced (overridden).
        Parameters:
        baseConfig - a configuration that will extend this instance's rule configuration

      • parse

        protected void parse(String rawContent)
              throws IOException,
                     YamlLintConfigException
        Parses a passed YAML configuration for this tool and updates ruleConf
        Parameters:
        rawContent - a YAML linter configuration
        Throws:
        YamlLintConfigException - if a parse error occurs
        IOException - if the passed configuration extends a standard configuration and that there is a problem reading this standard configuration file

      • validate

        protected void validate()
                 throws YamlLintConfigException
        Validates the rule configuration and instantiates the associated executable rules in rules
        Throws:
        YamlLintConfigException - if a mismatch exists between the configured rules and the rules contained in this package

      • validateRuleConf

        protected static Map<String,Object> validateRuleConf(Rule rule,
                                                     Object conf)
                                              throws YamlLintConfigException
        Validates a rule against a given configuration. The rule might be updated by this method.
        Parameters:
        rule - the rule to be validated against the passed configuration. Must not be null.
        conf - the YAML configuration of the rule
        Returns:
        the possibly updated YAML configuration if the rule has been validated or null if the rule is disabled by configuration
        Throws:
        YamlLintConfigException - if conf contains invalid configuration

      • getExtendedConfigFile

        protected URL getExtendedConfigFile(String name)
        Returns a URL pointing to the passed configuration file: local file system file or bundled configuration file identified by its name (without the ".yaml" extension)
        Parameters:
        name - the file name
        Returns:
        a URL to this file
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an error occurs handling the passed file name

      • getListRepresentation

        protected static String getListRepresentation(List list)
        Returns a representation of the passed list of objects (some object types have a specific representation, the default being Object.toString() or null if applicable.
        Parameters:
        list - a list of object
        Returns:
        a representation of the list and its objects

      • deepMerge

        protected static Map<Object,Object> deepMerge(Map<Object,Object> original,
                                              Map<Object,Object> newMap)
        Deeply merges 2 maps together (newMap is merged into original)
        Parameters:
        original - a map to be extended by newMap
        newMap - a map to be merged into original
        Returns:
        the original map
